      Adds a user to a section under the specified role.
      List SectionAwareness.findSiteMembersInRole(String siteContext, Role role, String pattern)
      Finds site members in the given context and Role with a matching name or display id.
      List SectionAwareness.getSectionMembersInRole(String sectionUuid, Role role)
      Gets the members of a given section that play a given role in the section.
      List SectionAwareness.getSiteMembersInRole(String siteContext, Role role)
      Gets the site membership for a given context.
      List SectionAwareness.getUnassignedMembersInRole(String siteContext, Role role)
      Gets all users who are members of a site but are members of zero sections within the site.
      boolean SectionAwareness.isSectionMemberInRole(String sectionId, String personId, Role role)
      Checks whether a user plays a particular Role in a section.
      boolean SectionAwareness.isSiteMemberInRole(String siteContext, String userUid, Role role)
      Checks whether a user plays a particular Role in a given site context.
      void SectionManager.setSectionMemberships(Set userUids, Role role, String sectionId)
      Defines the complete set of users that make up the members of a section in a given role.
